channel.title: Transaction on The Sound of Music
channel.description: Recent content in Transaction on The Sound of Music

item.title: Mysql Locks
item.description: Record Locks (记录锁) 事务 - 1 事务隔离级别 == REPEATABLE READ SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL REPEATABLE READ; START TRANSACTION; UPDATE tt_order_item SET Deleted = 1, Version = Version + 1 WHERE OrderNumber = '17111803861711180386'; COMMIT 事务 - 2 事务隔离级别 == REPEATABLE READ SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL REPEATABLE READ; START TRANSACTION; UPDATE tt_order_item SET Deleted = 0, Version = Version + 1 WHERE OrderNumber = '17111803861711180386'; COMMIT 事务 - 3 事务隔离级别 == READ COMMITTED
